languages.text: "Я должен проверить рапорты своих агентов. Согласно им, один из предводителей культа находится в сегменте Кьявы Гамма — {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}индустриального мира{/g}, расположенного во владениях династии фон Валанциус. Надеюсь, ты не будешь препятствовать моему расследованию".

traits.locale_text: "Я должен проверить рапорты своих агентов. Согласно им, один из предводителей Культа находится в сегменте Кьявы Гамма — индустриального мира, расположеннного во владениях династии фон Валанциус. Надеюсь, ты не будешь препятствовать моему расследованию".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "I need to confirm the reports from my agents. According to them, one of the cult's leaders is in the Kiava Gamma segment — an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} within the dominion of the von Valancius dynasty. I hope you won't impede my investigation."
languages.original_text: "Я должен проверить рапорты своих агентов. Согласно им, один из предводителей культа находится в сегменте Кьявы Гамма — {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}индустриального мира{/g}, расположенного во владениях династии фон Валанциус. Надеюсь, ты не будешь препятствовать моему расследованию".

traits.locale_text: "I need to confirm the reports from my agents. According to them, one of the cult's leaders is in the Kiava Gamma segment — an industrial world within the dominion of the von Valancius dynasty. I hope you won't impede my investigation."

traits.locale_text: "I need to confirm the reports from my agents. According to them, one of the cult's leaders is in the Kiava Gamma segment — an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} within the dominion of the von Valancius dynasty. I hope you won't impede my investigation."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我需要确认我的特工递交的报告是否真实。根据他们的报告，邪教其中一位领导人在基亚瓦伽马星，这个{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}工业世界{/g}在冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的统治之下。我希望你不要妨碍我的调查。”
languages.original_text: "I need to confirm the reports from my agents. According to them, one of the cult's leaders is in the Kiava Gamma segment — an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} within the dominion of the von Valancius dynasty. I hope you won't impede my investigation."

traits.locale_text: “我需要确认我的特工递交的报告是否真实。根据他们的报告，邪教其中一位领导人在基亚瓦伽马星，这个{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}工业世界{/g}在冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的统治之下。我希望你不要妨碍我的调查。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I need to confirm the reports from my agents. According to them, one of the cult's leaders is in the Kiava Gamma segment — an industrial world within the dominion of the von Valancius dynasty. I hope you won't impede my investigation."

languages.text: «Tengo que confirmar los informes de mis agentes. Según dicen, uno de los líderes del culto se encuentra en el segmento Kiava Gamma; un {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}mundo industrial{/g} en los dominios de la dinastía von Valancius. Espero que no entorpezca mi investigación».
languages.original_text: "I need to confirm the reports from my agents. According to them, one of the cult's leaders is in the Kiava Gamma segment — an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} within the dominion of the von Valancius dynasty. I hope you won't impede my investigation."

traits.locale_text: «Tengo que confirmar los informes de mis agentes. Según dicen, uno de los líderes del culto se encuentra en el segmento Kiava Gamma; un {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}mundo industrial{/g} en los dominios de la dinastía von Valancius. Espero que no entorpezca mi investigación».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「エージェントからの報告を確認する必要がある。彼らによれば、教団のリーダーの一人がキアヴァ・ガンマ宙域 、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の支配下にある{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}にいるという。私の調査を邪魔しないでもらいたい」
languages.original_text: "I need to confirm the reports from my agents. According to them, one of the cult's leaders is in the Kiava Gamma segment — an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} within the dominion of the von Valancius dynasty. I hope you won't impede my investigation."

traits.locale_text: 「エージェントからの報告を確認する必要がある。彼らによれば、教団のリーダーの一人がキアヴァ・ガンマ宙域 、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の支配下にある{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}にいるという。私の調査を邪魔しないでもらいたい」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich muss die Berichte meiner Agenten bestätigen. Offenbar befindet sich einer der Anführer des Kults im Kiava-Gamma-Segment — auf einer {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Produktionswelt{/g} innerhalb der Grenzen der Valancius-Dynastie. Ich hoffe, Ihr werdet meine Nachforschungen nicht behindern."
languages.original_text: "I need to confirm the reports from my agents. According to them, one of the cult's leaders is in the Kiava Gamma segment — an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} within the dominion of the von Valancius dynasty. I hope you won't impede my investigation."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss die Berichte meiner Agenten bestätigen. Offenbar befindet sich einer der Anführer des kults im Kiava-Gamma-Segment — auf einer {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Produktionswelt{/g} innerhalb der Grenzen der Valancius-Dynastie. Ich hoffe, Ihr werdet meine Nachforschungen nicht behindern."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je dois confirmer les rapports de mes agents. D'après eux, l'un des leaders du culte se trouverait dans le segment de Kiava Gamma, un {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}monde industriel{/g} sous l'hégémonie de la dynastie von Valancius. J'espère que vous n'interférerez pas avec mon enquête. »
languages.original_text: "I need to confirm the reports from my agents. According to them, one of the cult's leaders is in the Kiava Gamma segment — an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} within the dominion of the von Valancius dynasty. I hope you won't impede my investigation."

traits.locale_text: « Je dois confirmer les rapports de mes agents. D'après eux, l'un des leaders du culte se trouverait dans le segment de Kiava Gamma, un {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}monde industriel{/g} sous l'hégémonie de la dynastie von Valancius. J'espère que vous n'interférerez pas avec mon enquête. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Casuslarımın raporlarını doğrulamam gerek. Gelen bilgiye göre tarikat önderlerinden biri, von Valancius hanedanlığının hükmündeki {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}sınai dünya{/g} Kiava Gama'nın segmentinde. Soruşturmama köstek olmayacağını umuyorum."
languages.original_text: "I need to confirm the reports from my agents. According to them, one of the cult's leaders is in the Kiava Gamma segment — an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} within the dominion of the von Valancius dynasty. I hope you won't impede my investigation."

traits.locale_text: "Casuslarımın raporlarını doğrulamam gerek. Gelen bilgiye göre tarikat önderlerinden biri Kiava Gama segmentinde. Valancius hanedanlığının hükmünde bir {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}sınai dünya{/g}. Soruşturmama köstek olmayacağını umuyorum."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
